body.p:
The oxy_button built-in form control is used for graphical user interface objects that invokes a custom Author action (defined in the associated Document Type), using its defined ID. This type of form control supports the following properties:
. To make the button form control inherit its font from its parent element, set the fontInherit property to true
The element that contains the button form control represents the context where the action is invoked.
.

example.title: Button Form Control

body.note: You can use the Content Completion Assistant in the CSS editor to easily insert a sample of the form control by selecting the corresponding code template. The code templates are displayed with a symbol in the content complete list.
To insert a sample of the oxy_button form control, invoke the Content Completion Assistant by pressing and select the oxy_button code template.
